Articles.Content:
Always wanted to own your own Star Trek house? Now you can!

![StarTrek-house.jpg](http://www.rachelcericola.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/StarTrek-house.jpg)

This 34m^2^ is real and it's for sale. It's located in Hinckley England and will cost you Ã‚Â£70,000.

[http://www.rightmove.co.uk/property-for-sale/property-49902001.html](http://www.rightmove.co.uk/property-for-sale/property-49902001.html)

It's incredibly packed / well-done. Nice place to visit, but there's little free space available, for my extensive collection of 20th century antiques ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
